arguments.template: <ng-content></ng-content>

<ng-template>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</ng-template>

{{step.label}} {{step.sublabel | truncate:30}}
{{step.label}} {{step.sublabel}}

{{number || ''}}
check_circle
warning
mode_edit

<mat-tab-group [attr.mat-stretch-tabs]="stretchTabs ? true : undefined"
                [backgroundColor]="backgroundColor"
                [color]="color"
                [disableRipple]="disableRipple"
                [selectedIndex]="selectedIndex"
                (selectedIndexChange)="selectedIndexChange($event)">
  <ng-template let-tabOption
                ngFor
                [ngForOf]="tabOptions">
    <mat-tab [disabled]="tabOption.disabled || disabled">
      <ng-template matTabLabel>
        <ng-template *ngIf="tabOption.content" [cdkPortalOutlet]="tabOption.content">
        </ng-template>
      </ng-template>
    </mat-tab>
  </ng-template>
</mat-tab-group>

<ng-template>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</ng-template>

<ng-content></ng-content>
<mat-icon *ngIf="_displayIcon"
          class="td-breadcrumb-separator-icon"
          [style.cursor]="'default'"
          (click)="_handleIconClick($event)">
  {{separatorIcon}}
</mat-icon>

<td-step-header class="td-step-header-wrapper"
                [tabIndex]="-1"
                [number]="number"
                [active]="active"
                [disableRipple]="disableRipple || disabled"
                [disabled]="disabled" 
                [state]="state">
  <ng-template td-step-header-label [ngIf]="true">{{label}}</ng-template>
  <ng-template td-step-header-sublabel [ngIf]="true">{{sublabel | truncate:30}}</ng-template>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</td-step-header>
